markdownRemark.html:
Greg at point and pay is in need of two ColdFusion developers ASAP. Here is his messsage to the Tampa CF Jobs list.

"We are in dire need of at least some temporary

help for the next few weeks. Anyone with some free time the next 2-3 weeks, give us a shout at jobs@pointandpay.com. We'll make it worth your while."

frontmatter.title: Immediate need for two ColdFusion developers
In San Jose this week for Managers Summit
